donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Global Fund CCM's fundding policy was revised to expand the available funding to CCMs (including to sub CCM & regional coordinating mechanisms) and came into effect on February 2010, the funds came from the global fund secretariat budget and not the grant. Eligible cost include salary for CCM secretariat staff, consultancy work, office expenses, CCM meetings, communications, information dissemenation, organization & facilitation of meetings.

project_descr: Comprehensiveness and Quality of DOTS in Sudan, addressing TB control in war-affected, post conflict areas and other challenges.
